summary: The new Army Futures Command oversees Army modernization—upgrading its weapons and capabilities. The command considers working with small businesses to be critical to its success. Command officials say they will continue prior Army efforts to reach out and award contracts to small businesses. They are also exploring innovative ways to help small businesses develop technologies that address Army needs. However, we found they were not...
title: Army Modernization: Army Futures Command Should Take Steps to Improve Small Business Engagement for Research and Development
